document.full_text: former "american idol" judge paula abdul reunited with simon cowell on sunday, joining the celebrity panel on the upcoming u.s. version of the music impresario's tv talent show "the x factor."
document.title: paula abdul joins simon cowell on "x factor"
lines_and_colors: former "american idol" judge paula abdul reunited with simon cowell on sunday, joining the celebrity panel on the upcoming u.s. version of the music impresario's tv talent show "the x factor."
